mapper.select: select pt.product_id, pt.title, pt.price, pt.description, pt.origin, pt.thumbnail_img, pt.created_date, ct.category_id as ct_category_id, ct.name, sct.semi_category_id, sct.name as sct_name from products_tb pt left outer join product_categories_tb pct on (pt.product_id = pct.product_id) left outer join categories_tb ct on (pct.category_id = ct.category_id) left outer join semi_categories_tb sct on (sct.semi_category_id = pct.semi_category_id) where pt.title like concat('%',trim(ifnull(#{keyword},'')),'%') limit #{startIndex},20

select count(*) from products_tb pt left outer join product_categories_tb pct on (pt.product_id = pct.product_id) left outer join categories_tb ct on (pct.category_id = ct.category_id) left outer join semi_categories_tb sct on (sct.semi_category_id = pct.semi_category_id) where pt.title like concat('%',trim(ifnull(#{title},'')),'%')

select pt.product_id, pt.title, pt.price, pt.description, pt.origin, pt.thumbnail_img, pt.contents_img1, pt.contents_img2, pt.contents_img3, pt.contents_img4, ct.category_id as ct_category_id, ct.name, sct.semi_category_id, sct.name as sct_name from products_tb pt left outer join product_categories_tb pct on (pt.product_id = pct.product_id) left outer join categories_tb ct on (pct.category_id = ct.category_id) left outer join semi_categories_tb sct on (sct.semi_category_id = pct.semi_category_id) where pt.product_id = #{productId}

select pt.product_id, pt.title, pt.price, pt.stock, pt.sales_count, pt.description, pt.origin, pt.thumbnail_img, pt.contents_img1, pt.contents_img2, pt.contents_img3, pt.contents_img4, pt.created_date, ct.category_id as ct_category_id, ct.name, sct.semi_category_id, sct.name as sct_name from products_tb pt left outer join product_categories_tb pct on (pt.product_id = pct.product_id) left outer join categories_tb ct on (pct.category_id = ct.category_id) left outer join semi_categories_tb sct on (sct.semi_category_id = pct.semi_category_id) group by pt.product_id limit #{startIndex}, #{limit}
select product_id, title, price, description, thumbnail_img from products_tb order by created_date desc limit 8
select product_id, title, price, description, thumbnail_img from products_tb order by stock desc limit 10
select product_id, title, price, description, thumbnail_img from products_tb order by stock desc limit 5;
